document_data.name: Shelves of Honor
document_data.mainbody: '''Shelves of Honor''' were special graves found beneath [[Battlehall]] in [[Zhentil Keep]]'s [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]..
document_data.History: The Shelves of Honor were carved into the solid rock walls beneath Battehall, a temple dedicated to [[Tempus]]. Faithful heroes of Tempus who died heroically in battle were interred here as an honor. It was rumored that anyone buried on a Shelf of Honor served as a favorite of Tempus in the afterlife.
